blocks.name: congtr
blocks.content: A wff of the form ` A || ( B - C ) ` is interpreted as a congruential equation. This is similar to ` ( B mod A ) = ( C mod A ) ` , but is defined such that behavior is regular for zero and negative values of ` A ` . To use this concept effectively, we need to show that congruential equations behave similarly to normal equations; first a transitivity law. Idea for the future: If there was a congruential equation symbol, it could incorporate type constraints, so that most of these would not need them. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm congtr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c3)))
} = {
  breqtrd(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c3), co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3)))))
  syl31anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  zsubcld(c1, c2, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3)))))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  simp2l(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cz))
  zsubcl(c2, c3)
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  dvds2add(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c2, cmin, c3))
  npncand(c1, c2, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3)))))
  3ad2ant1(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(c2, cc))
  adantr(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(c3, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c3, cc))
  zcn(c3)
}

blocks.name: congadd
blocks.content: If two pairs of numbers are componentwise congruent, so are their sums. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm congadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c4))))
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c4)), co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  3impia(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz))), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cz))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz))
  zsubcl(c1, c2)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cz))
  zsubcl(c3, c4)
  dvds2add(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c3, cmin, c4))
  3adant3(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c4)), co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  addsub4d(c1, c3, c2, c4, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz))))
  zcnd(c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)))
  ad2antrl(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c3, cc))
  zcn(c3)
  zcnd(c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz))))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)))
  ad2antll(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c4, cc))
  zcn(c4)
}

blocks.name: congmul
blocks.content: If two pairs of numbers are componentwise congruent, so are their products. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm congmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c4))))
} = {
  syl222anc(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c4))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c3), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c4), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c4), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c4))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c4), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c4))))
  zmulcld(c1, c3, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  simp2l(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  zmulcld(c1, c4, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  zmulcld(c2, c4, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  breqtrd(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c4)), co(c1, cmul, co(c3, cmin, c4)), w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  mpd(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))
  simp3r(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))
  syl3anc(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmul, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cz))
  3ad2ant2(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cz))
  zsubcl(c3, c4)
  dvdsmultr2(c0, c1, co(c3, cmin, c4))
  subdid(c1, c3, c4, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  3ad2ant2(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wcel(c3, cc))
  adantr(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c3, cc))
  zcn(c3)
  breqtrd(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, c4), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c4)), co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmul, c4), w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  mpd(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmul, c4)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  simp3l(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))
  syl3anc(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmul, c4))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cz), wcel(c4, cz))
  simp11(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  zsubcld(c1, c2, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  simp12(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  simp13(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  simp2r(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))))
  dvdsmultr1(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), c4)
  subdird(c1, c2, c4, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4)))))
  3ad2ant1(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wcel(c1, cc))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  3ad2ant1(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wcel(c2, cc))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  3ad2ant2(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c3, cmin, c4))), wcel(c4, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c4, cc))
  zcn(c4)
  congtr(c0, co(c1, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c4), co(c2, cmul, c4))
}

blocks.name: congsym
blocks.content: Congruence mod ` A ` is a symmetric/commutative relation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm congsym(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c1))))
  breqtrrd(c0, cdvds, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(c1, cmin, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  negsubdi2d(c2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c1)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cz))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  zsubcld(c2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  dvdsnegb(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1))
}

blocks.name: congneg
blocks.content: If two integers are congruent mod ` A ` , so are their negatives. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: congsub
blocks.content: If two pairs of numbers are componentwise congruent, so are their differences. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: congid
blocks.content: Every integer is congruent to itself mod every base. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpcong

blocks.name: congrep
blocks.content: Every integer is congruent to some number in the fundamental domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Oct-2014.)

} = {

  zre(c1)
